hero.description: Hello! My name is Quincy Iheme and I am an Engineering Leader focused on team-building and advancing careers with more than 8 years of industry experience.

features.heading: Focused on Personal and Professional Improvement

featuresTwo.heading: Relaying Experiences to the Technology Community
featuresTwo.description: I spend my time at both internal and external events speaking about my experiences in the technology industry, and how we can all work together for the better.

contactForm.description: Use the below form to send a message to me. I'll get back to you shortly!
